title: CE31214: Construction And Building Materials - Quick Facts
text:
CE31214
Course name | Construction And Building Materials
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, Historical development; Basic concept and characteristics, Properties of typical composite materials; Elastic behavior of unidirectional lamina and multidirectional laminate, Stress-strain relationship, Strength and failure; Hygrothermal effect; End-use performance properties of structural composites; Low density rigid foam materials, Sandwich construction, design methods; Structural forms of composites and their use in the construction industry; Analysis and design of composite structures; Numerical design and detailing.
